  • Constructor Details

    • ExamManagementController

      public ExamManagementController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by setting up the ComboBoxes, TableView, and applying default filters. It also adds a listener to handle exam selection and loading associated questions.

    • loadQuestionsForSelectedExam

      private void loadQuestionsForSelectedExam(Exam selectedExam)
      Loads the questions associated with the selected exam into the 'questionsInExamTableView'.
      Parameters:
      selectedExam - The selected exam whose questions need to be loaded.

    • populateCourseComboBoxes

      private void populateCourseComboBoxes()
      Populates the course ComboBoxes with the list of course IDs from the database.

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes the tables to reflect the current state of the database for exams and questions. It also restores the previous selection of an exam if available.

    • applyBothFilter

      private void applyBothFilter()
      Applies both the question filter and the exam filter.

    • onQuestionFilter

      public void onQuestionFilter()
      Filters the questions based on user inputs in the UI filters (question text, score, and type).

    • onResetQuestionFilter

      public void onResetQuestionFilter()
      Resets the question filters and restores the original list of questions in the table.

    • onExamFilter

      public void onExamFilter()
      Filters the exams based on user inputs in the UI filters (exam name, course ID, and publish status).

    • onResetExamFilter

      public void onResetExamFilter()
      Resets the exam filters and restores the original list of exams in the table.

    • onDeleteLeft

      public void onDeleteLeft()
      Deletes the selected question from the exam. If there is no question left after execution of delete, it will set publish status to be no.

    • onAddLeft

      public void onAddLeft()
      Adds a selected question to the selected exam. An exam must be created for the question to be added. To create an exam, the user must go to Question Bank Management system, create an exam on it.

    • onDelete

      public void onDelete()
      Deletes the selected exam and associated records and grades from the database. There must be selected exam for it to be removed. If not, it will display an alert

    • onAdd

      public void onAdd()
      Adds a new exam to the system.It will get the information from the user input fields and will add to the exam database. There are some criteria to be met for the new exam to be added to the database 1. All the relevant fields must be filled 2. Exam time must be a positive integer 3. Course must be found in the Course Database 4. Can be only published if there is at least one question in the exam. 5. Before adding question, there must be an exam created

    • onUpdate

      public void onUpdate()
      Updates the selected exam in the database with new details. This happens when update button is pressed There are some criteria to be met for the new exam to be added to the database * 1. All the relevant fields must be filled * 2. Exam time must be a positive integer * 3. Course must be found in the Course Database * 4. Can be only published if there is at least one question in the exam. * 5. Before adding question, there must be an exam created

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String message)
      Displays an alert message with the provided content text.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display in the alert.

    • clearSelection

      private void clearSelection()
      Clears all the information fields in the examName,examTime, CourseId, Publish information
